Text: I hope this will stealth patch mw 2 good enough to not get banned online.
DONT DOWNLOAD THIS IS FAKE THEY ALL ARE IF YOU RUN IT THROUGH IT WILL SAY IT HAS FIXED BUT IT HASNT THIS IS SURE TO GET YOU BANNED!!!

To Danny,

This is the legit abgx release and is the premiere software for stealth patching backups, far and away.

We are dealing with a whole new issue here. It's been speculated that Microsoft can detect our iXtreme firmware and ban us.  I got banned to by the way. Always used the latest firmware and always abgx'd my backups.  

Almost a million consoles were banned last month. They beat us this time, but c4eva is working on an all new FW called Lite Touch that may solve our problems.  Please don't dis my torrent without doing your homework.

man people have no clue and refuse to stay up on the game. 

your shit got banned because m$ aren't a bunch of dumb asses...forevery program writer that hooks up the by pass program, they got 40 on the clock trying to figure out how people are getting through the matrix.

its not a certain game, its not a certain modder, its that shit that goes in order to play this game you must update your console....and the nerd at m$ is like ah ha caught another send his ass the ban message and tell him if he wants to play cod mw2 online go buy it and a new 360.

you don't  want a banned console don't take it online and play by yourself. point blank, period.

the machine always wins, its only a matter of time.
If you got banned, try to remember as hard as we tried not to get noticed, it was us at the end of the day who decided to mod our consoles.... not M$.
